Articles.Content: does anyone have tutorials of making siggys on adobe photoshop???

Have you tried looking for such tutorials on a dedicated photoshop forum ? Cause this forum right there is about gameplay questions for KSP. (Wich is a completely different thing.) This is the wrong place to ask this question...

Welcome aboard, longting!

Hcube is right, this isn't quite the right subforum for this sort of question, moving over to the Space Lounge and making your title a bit more descriptive. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

A nice approach with photoshop and other drawing wysywig, at first take a random pic of your choice then try each fonctionnalities one by one (+ play with parameter and sliders). Once this is done express yourself the way you want with it.

I think concerning thing like "drawing" and "office suit" softwares it most often do the tricks for anyone even young one and that's it's a pretty nice apporach, for more technical and less artitistic related wysywig tool that include more specific fonctionalities it could be slighty harder to do the same at first but could work also time to time then i would recommend a tuto check.
